topic.title: UZF GWT: Run Flow and Transport Models

para.text: UZF GWT: Run Flow and Transport Models

Now run MODFLOW again. The flow and transport models will run in the same simulation in this case. Budgets for both the flow and transport models will be displayed in ModelMonitor and the listing files for the flow model, the transport model, and the simulation will open in a text editor. None of those should display any warning or error messages. If they do, check that you have entered the data correctly.
